ordered_list.1: Some people prefer to eat at restaurants while others prefer to prepare and eat at home. Which eating option do you prefer?
ordered_list.2: Computers do not help children learn more effectively. The use of computers has a negative effect on childrenâ€™s physical and mental development. Some of them even suffer from autism. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
ordered_list.3: People believe the government should provide and promote public transportation to help their country develop. Public transport systems can reduce traffic and bring many benefits to cities. They are more convenient and people can use them at cheaper prices. Write an essay to encourage people to travel by bus and limit using private cars.
ordered_list.4: The role of textbooks in language learning has been debated for many years. Some people believe that textbooks are essential tools that provide a structured and comprehensive approach to language learning. Do you agree or disagree?
